content.description:
Follow directions on how to get to the peak. Reach the base of the wall with trees. You can climb up long ramp or choose a different way to reach ledge. (150ft)

 Next pitch starts on the right side of the main face at a massive chickenhead that is 5 feet off the ground. Follow chickenheads and nice cracks of all sizes until you get to a big ledge with boulders. (90ft)

 Go up squeeze off width and sling some jugs. follow low angle cracks with more chickenheads to the top (100ft)
content.protection:
standard to #2   one 60m 

  Rap off tree - 50 ft backside and walk off

content.description:
Ol' Western is a prominent peak that stands out in this particular area of the stronghold. It rises out from behind the established domes Naiches nest and trad rock.

 If you are driving around there you can't miss this peak.
